artist: Delineator: After John Hamilton Mortimer; Engraver: John Hall
description: two images mounted on one sheet: top image: an illustration to Aristo's 'Orlando Furioso"; procession in a temple with casket in center and the procession behind; two women at left, one holding a large book and speaking with woman in armor; man with sheild and spear in armor at right second image: woman wearing armor, holding a sword in right hand, gesturing to a man in armor on the ground; a grove of trees in right distance with a figure in the trees; winged creature behind woman; mountain in right distance with castle on top
dimension:
3 3/16 × 4 1/16 in. (8.1 × 10.32 cm) (image, sheet, top image)
3 1/4 × 4 1/8 in. (8.26 × 10.48 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 7/8 × 8 13/16 in. (30.16 × 22.38 cm) (mount)
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

top image: on sheet in black: Book 3 / J. Mortimer del   J. Hall sc. | on sheet in pencil: 2-99

lower image: on sheet in black: Book4 / J Mortimer del   J. Hall sc | on sheet in pencil 2-99
title: Print
